thread.title: WoW SoD Phase 3: Priest Healer BIS Gear Guide (Disc & Holy Specs)
thread.title_full: WoW SoD Phase 3: Priest Healer BIS Gear Guide (Disc & Holy Specs)

author: Matt Hook
title: WoW SoD Phase 3: Priest Healer BIS Gear Guide (Disc & Holy Specs)
text: Discipline & Holy Priests in WoW Classic: Season of Discovery had an incredible and overpowered first 2 phases, and continue to be powerhouses in terms of healing in raids. With gear available from Nightmare Incursions, PVP, Sunken Temple, and more, there are a lot of options for priest players obtaining their best in slot. This guide will go over the best in slot pieces for healing priests as well as other options they can obtain on the road to BIS. For the most part, the stat priority for Holy and Disc Priests in SoD is: - MP5 (mana per 5 seconds) - Intellect (for mana pool) - Healing = Spell Damage - Spirit (for mana regen) - Spell Hit Chance (up to 5%) WoW: SoD Phase 3 Healing Priest Best in Slot Gear Slot Item | | How To Get Head | | The Temple of Atal'Hakkar Neck | | Quest -
